articles.title: The launch date for Galaxy Z Flip 6, Z Fold 6 is all but confirmed - Android Authority
articles.description: Another outlet has dished out a launch date and venue for Samsung's next Unpacked event, where we'll likely see new foldables.
articles.content:
• Samsungs second Unpacked event of the year will take place on July 10 in Paris, according to a Korean website.
  • This corroborates a report from a month ago which first mentioned a July… [+1420 chars]

articles.author: Jeff Foust
articles.title: Airbus to build ESA space science satellite - SpaceNews
articles.description: ESA has awarded Airbus Defence and Space a contract to build a spacecraft that will provide a unique view of the sun.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON The European Space Agency has awarded Airbus Defence and Space a contract to build a spacecraft that will provide a unique view of the sun.
ESA held a signing ceremony May 22 in Brussels … [+2339 chars]
